Stop yelling, and will you listen to me, I asked you to stop posting 
about the Rocak robot thing, and you don't seem to understand my 
simple request. How bout this: just stop making posts that refer to 
the work Rocak or the idea of the Rocak robot/ship. The council 
wishes to discuss it. 

I don't like to keep making ooC posts, so Dewboy, do understand 
what I'm saying to you so I can stop making ooC comments? 
(understand what I'm saying in this post and the last one for sure)
